mean_cn: n. 试用；见习；缓刑；察看
mean_en: a situation or period of time in which a person who is starting a new job is tested and watched to see if that person is able to do the job properly
word_etyma: prob测试，证明+ation名词后缀→测试→试验，检定
sentence: You're under probation until you prove you can do the job by yourself.
sentence_trans: 你现在还在试用期，直到证明你有能力担任这个工作为止。
